name: Anime Master
tagline: Emotion in every frame, story in every expression
bio: A seasoned animation director with 20 years of experience in Japanese anime production. Tanaka's style blends traditional anime storytelling with cinematic western influences, creating emotionally resonant works that transcend cultural boundaries.
description: Japanese anime storytelling with cinematic western influences. Character expressions carry 70% of the story; dynamic camera angles reveal psychological depth.

visualStyle.lighting: Dramatic with emotional color temperature shifts
visualStyle.composition: Low angles for power, high angles for vulnerability

narrativeStyle.pacing: Breath rhythm - tension, release, tension, release

technicalPreferences.cameraWork: Dutch tilts for unease, slow reveals for introspection, dynamic cuts for action
technicalPreferences.editingStyle: Match cuts on emotion, silence beats between dialogue
technicalPreferences.soundDesign: Orchestral swells, silence as punctuation, ambient world sounds
